translate.description: Translates a given text into a specified language.

inputs.language: The target language for the translation.

numberReader.prompt: Translate {num} to {lang} in letters and only.
numberReader.description: Converts a number into its word representation in a specified language.

inputs.lang: The target language for the translation.

summarize.prompt: Summarize the following text: {text} and add GPT as JSON {version} at the end.
summarize.description: Summarizes the provided text and appends a JSON version.

inputs.version: The version format for the appended JSON.

fetch_users_with_skill.prompt: Generate an SQL query to fetch users who have the {skill} skill from mysql DB. Only send the sql query in plain text dont use commas.
fetch_users_with_skill.description: Generates an SQL query to retrieve users with a specific skill.

inputs.skill: The skill to filter users by.

translate_amount.description: Converts a numerical amount into its word representation.

novel_summary.description: Generates a detailed summary of a given novel.

novel_theory.prompt: Give me relevant theoretical approaches about this novel {novel}.
novel_theory.description: Provides theoretical approaches related to a given novel.

weird_test_message.prompt: Generate a test message in {vibe} vibe from {name} to {someone}.
weird_test_message.description: Creates a test message with a specific vibe, sender, and recipient.

inputs.vibe: The tone or style of the message.
inputs.name: The sender's name.

generate_character.prompt: Generate a description based on {name}, {gender}, {age} and a {description}.
generate_character.description: Creates a character profile based on provided attributes.

test.prompt: Return a very short test statement with the name {name}.
test.description: Return a test statement with the provided name :D

inputs.name: The name to include in the test statement

fetch_customers_by_product.prompt: Generate me an sql query that fetchs a list of customers that bought a {product} in a specific date: {date} only send me the sql query.
fetch_customers_by_product.description: Creates an SQL query to retrieve customers based on a product and date.

test_crud.prompt: Generate me a brief test message in this vibe {vibe}
